question.text: How many items can be stored in the inventory?

answer.details: 27 stacks can be stored in the main inventory, 9 in the hotbar, 1 off-hand slot and 4 armour slots. Giving a potential maximum of 2372 individual items.

question.text: How many items can be stored in a double chest?

answer.details: 54 stacks of items works out as a total of 3456 individual items. Assuming all items can be stacked up to 64.
